_comment: Merge into agents.defaults in /mnt/openclaw-state/openclaw.json — enables cross-session history access, 30m heartbeat cadence, and enforces full HEARTBEAT.md protocol execution

agents.defaults.heartbeat.prompt: Execute HEARTBEAT.md — all phases, all steps, in order. Phase 3 Steps 1-4 are mandatory every tick. Complete Step 4 logging before responding. Do not infer or repeat old tasks from prior chats.
